name: svg-png
title: svg-png
description:
convert a svg to a png.
Based on Theos quickPic
author: plutotom

commands.name: svg-png
commands.title: svg-png
commands.subtitle: convert svg to png
commands.description: SHOW LIST Convert SVG files to PNG with custom scaling

commands.name: svg-png-url
commands.title: svg-png-url
commands.description:
takes in a url of a svg (or file path) and converts it to a png
RUN SCRIPT

commands.name: typeahead-svg-to-png
commands.title: typeahead svg to png
commands.description:
svg to png but using fzf to find svgs on your disk
SHOW TYPEAHEAD

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: defaultOutputPath
preferences.title: Output Directory
preferences.description: Where to save converted PNG files
